Exec.Command: $(FROMELF) -S -j ER_$(TARGETLOCATION) -j ER_IRAM_TC -j ER_$(TARGETLOCATION)_CONT -j ER_RAM_RO -j ER_RAM_RW -O binary @(EXEOutput) $(EXEName).bin

Message.Text: Properties used by the MF Build System:
platform imxs|mote2|etc. target platform to compile
memory flash|ram target memory device for the binaries
build Invoke the build target, which builds the platform specified.
This is the default target if no target is specified on the
clean Invoke the clean files target, which deletes all the dependent
cleanHal Delete the solution dependent binaries, i.e. the drivers.
cleanClr Delete the solution independent binaries, i.e the CLR.
cleanbuild Invoke clean and then build target.
help Display this helpful usage text.
